signature: String sendSignedRequest(String, String, Map<String, Object>, HttpMethod, boolean)

enhanced_by.method_name: sendApiRequest(String, String, Map<String, Object>, HttpMethod, boolean)
enhanced_by.reason: sendApiRequest checks for non-null and non-empty API key, which is also a prerequisite for sendSignedRequest.
UrlBuilder.buildTimestamp is used to generate a timestamp for the request parameters, which is essential for the signature generation in sendSignedRequest.
Both sendSignedRequest and handleResponse process and return responses from API requests, making handleResponse a suitable method for constructing assertions.
The signature generation process is central to sendSignedRequest, and testing the output of getSignature can provide insights into the correctness of the request signature.
